item.title: Boltbus
item.description: Boltbus, or as I like to call it capitalism on wheels. I’ve bought a Boltbus ticket for $1 and I’ve bought one for $70, I bet there are derivatives being traded on these ticket prices. But all in all it’s always a pleasant ride, you know why? Because there’s a toilet on the bus. In India when you travel by buses you have to schedule each one your leaks and dumps.
